HTTPMethodsPUT.summary: The HTTP PUT request method creates a new resource or replaces a representation of the target resource with the request payload.

remarks.para: The difference between PUT and {{HTTPMethod("POST")}} is that PUT is idempotent: calling it once or several times successively has the same effect (that is no side effect), whereas successive identical {{HTTPMethod("POST")}} requests may have additional effects, akin to placing an order several times.
